flavorText: Reflections from the wind-sculpted snow gleam with every color of the rainbow.

foreignData.flavorText: Spiegelungen vom windgepeitschten Schnee glänzen in allen Farben des Regenbogens.
foreignData.name: Schimmerschnee-Tal
foreignData.text:
Das Schimmerschnee-Tal kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie das Schimmerschnee-Tal ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe.
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Los reflejos de la nieve esculpida por el viento brillan con cada color del arcoíris.
foreignData.name: Valle del brillo errante
foreignData.text:
El Valle del brillo errante entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Valle del brillo errante entre al campo de batalla, elige un color.
{T}: Agrega un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Les reflets sur la neige sculptée par le vent brillent de toutes les couleurs de l'arc-en-ciel.
foreignData.name: Val de la Congère scintillante
foreignData.text:
Le Val de la Congère scintillante arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Au moment où le Val de la Congère scintillante arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: I riflessi della neve scolpita dal vento brillano di ogni colore dell'arcobaleno.
foreignData.name: Valle dei Fiocchi Lucenti
foreignData.text:
La Valle dei Fiocchi Lucenti entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Valle dei Fiocchi Lucenti entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 風に削られた雪に反射する光が、虹のすべての色に染まっている。
foreignData.name: 煌積の谷間
foreignData.text:
煌積の谷間はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
煌積の谷間が戦場に出るに際し、色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 바람에 흩날린 눈에서 반사된 빛이 무지개의 모든 색깔로 반짝인다.
foreignData.name: 반짝일렁임 계곡
foreignData.text:
반짝일렁임 계곡은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
반짝일렁임 계곡이 전장에 들어오면서, 색 한 개를 선택한다.
{T}: 선택된 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Reflexos da neve esculpida pelo vento brilhavam com todas as cores do arco-íris.
foreignData.name: Vale do Gelo Cintilante
foreignData.text:
Vale do Gelo Cintilante entra no campo de batalha virado.
Conforme Vale do Gelo Cintilante entrar no campo de batalha, escolha uma cor.
{T}: Adicione um mana da cor escolhida.

foreignData.flavorText: Отражения от фигур, которые ветер изваял из снега, сверкают всеми цветами радуги.
foreignData.name: Долина Снежного Мерцания
foreignData.text:
Долина Снежного Мерцания выходит на поле битвы повернутой.
При выходе Долины Снежного Мерцания на поле битвы выберите цвет.
{T}: добавьте одну ману выбранного цвета.

foreignData.flavorText: 寒风塑造的多样积雪折射出彩虹的斑斓光辉。
foreignData.name: 烁迹山谷
foreignData.text:
烁迹山谷须横置进战场。
于烁迹山谷进战场时，选择一种颜色。
{T}：加一点该色的法术力。

foreignData.flavorText: 寒風塑造的多樣積雪折射出彩虹的斑斕光輝。
foreignData.name: 爍跡山谷
foreignData.text:
爍跡山谷須橫置進戰場。
於爍跡山谷進戰場時，選擇一種顏色。
{T}：加一點該色的魔法力。

name: Shimmerdrift Vale
originalText:
Shimmerdrift Vale enters the battlefield tapped.
As Shimmerdrift Vale enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

rulings.text: Snow is a supertype, not a card type. It has no rules meaning or function by itself, but spells and abilities may refer to it.
The {S} symbol is a generic mana symbol. It represents a cost that can be paid by one mana that was produced by a snow source. That mana can be any color or colorless.
Snow isn’t a type of mana. If an effect says you may spend mana as though it were any type, you can’t pay for {S} using mana that wasn’t produced by a snow source.
Some cards have additional effects for each {S} spent to cast them. You can cast these spells even if you don’t spend any snow mana to cast them; their additional effects simply won’t do anything.

The Kaldheim set doesn’t have any cards with mana costs that include {S}, but some previous sets do. If an effect says such a spell costs {1} less to cast, that reduction doesn’t apply to any {S} costs. This is also true for activated abilities that include {S} in their activation costs and effects that reduce those costs.

text:
Shimmerdrift Vale enters the battlefield tapped.
As Shimmerdrift Vale enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.
